eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
d \tau^n + {(-1)}^{n+1} \tau^n d &=& n\, {\tilde{d^\dagger}} \tau^{n-1} \nonumber \\
d^\dagger \tau + \tau d^\dagger &=& 0 \nonumber \\
d \eta + \eta d &=& 0 \nonumber \\
d^{\dagger} \eta^n + {(-1)}^{n+1} \eta^n d^{\dagger} &=& n\, {\tilde{d}} \eta^{n-1} \label{eq:x1} \\
\tau \eta - \eta \tau &=& (D-p-q) 1 \nonumber \\
\sigma \tau &=& \tau \sigma \nonumber \\
\sigma \eta &=& \eta \sigma \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
& \sigma^{(ij)} & \sum_{I \in S_N} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{N-1} i_N )} F - \sum_{I \in S_N} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{N-1} i_{N} )} \sigma^{(ij)}\, F \nonumber \\
&& \label{eq:x5a} \\  
&=& \sum \tau^{(j i_s )} \tau^{(j i_r )} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{N-1} i_N )} F
\nonumber
